channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: Join us on this special episode as we sit down with Safeliz, a global Christian publishing ministry dedicated to providing life-changing resources that nurture the whole person-body, mind, and spirit. From beautifully crafted Study Bibles to uplifting Praise and Worship editions, Safeliz produces a wide range of materials designed to inspire and transform lives. Be sure to tune in and discover how you can get access to these incredible resources.
